10
THE CIRCLE OF INTESTATE HEIRS
(1) On the basis of an Act, the following may inherit from a decedent: his or her descendants, his or her adoptive children and the descendants thereof, his or her spouse, his or her parents, his or her adoptive parent and the relatives thereof, his or her brothers and sisters and the descendants thereof, and his or her grandfathers and grandmothers and the descendants thereof.
(2) All of the above persons shall inherit in accordance with the lines of succession.
(3) Heirs of close succession shall exclude from succession heirs of more remote succession.
